channel.title: [PI] Deception Client Error
channel.description: I get this error when trying to load the client and it doesn't load up the client fully. It shows a black screen and says: Sorry, an error has occurred whilst loading deception. Then in the cmd prompt it says: [code]Deception is loading.. java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException at client.drawLogo(client.java:3713) at client.startUp(client.java:8486) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5759) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 20[/code]

item.title: [PI] Deception Client Error
item.dc:creator: @JustChillBro JustChillBro
